item.title: Seminar on interdisciplinarity in practice
item.description:
Isabelle Arpin, a sociologist from Grenoble, organised a 2-day seminar on interdisciplinarity. The idea was for the participants to share their experience in practicing interdisciplinarity.

Coralie Mounet, Nicolas Lescureux and I gave a talk on our collaboration on the attitude towards brown bears.

item.title: Ecology meets linguistic
item.description: We organized a meeting between our lab and Praxiling a lab working in linguistic to explore potential collaborations between ecology and linguistic. Marie Chandelier and I gave a talk on our recent results on a content analysis we performed on wolf recovery in France and its coverage by newspapers. More soon on this front.
